mean_en: a state of not being respected or trusted by most people :a state of having a bad reputation
word_etyma: dis否定 + repute名声 → disrepute 坏名声
short_phrase: her bad behavior brings her into disrepute
sentence: Your trashy behavior is bringing you into disrepute!
sentence_trans: 你的垃圾行为正在给你带来坏名声！
